entries: Your familiar keeps its eyes and ears open, ready to relay every snippet of gossip it catches, helping you gather information. Despite being a {@trait minion}, your familiar gains 1 reaction at the start of its turns, which it can use only to {@action Aid} you on a {@skill Diplomacy} check to {@action Gather Information} (it still has to prepare to help you as normal for the {@action Aid} reaction, which requires it to participate throughout the activity). It automatically succeeds at its check to {@action Aid} you with those skills or automatically critically succeeds if you're a master of the skill in question.
